thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Friday, 13 Apr 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Hunan TV & Broadcast Posts Preliminary 2017 Net Loss, To Swing To Red In Q1

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Hunan TV & Broadcast Posts Preliminary 2017 Net Loss, To Swing To Red In Q1

organizations.name: reuters) - hunan tv & broadcast intermediary co ltd

text:
April 13 (Reuters) - Hunan TV & Broadcast Intermediary Co Ltd:
* SAYS PRELIM 2017 NET LOSS OF 465.36 MILLION YUAN ($74.11 million) VERSUS NET PROFIT OF 333.14 MILLION YUAN YEAR AGO
* SAYS IT EXPECTS Q1 NET LOSS OF 40-60 MLN YUAN VS NET PROFIT OF 101.1 MLN YUAN YEAR AGO Source text in Chinese: bit.ly/2GUOO68 ; bit.ly/2JFz9Wd Further company coverage: ($1 = 6.2795 Chinese yuan renminbi) (Reporting by Hong Kong newsroom)
